hypothesis_content.title: CRV Liquidity Crisis Contagion to Mid-Cap DeFi
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, a ≥25% daily drop in CRV price (due to protocol-specific issues) triggers contagion selling in mid-cap DeFi tokens (AAVE, COMP, MKR) within 48 hours, creating oversold bounces of ≥12% in the most correlated victims.
hypothesis_content.rationale: DeFi protocols are highly correlated during stress. CRV's size and centrality make it a contagion vector. Forced selling in one protocol triggers margin calls/liquidations in others. Oversold conditions in high-quality victims revert faster.
entry_conditions: CRV price drops ≥25% in 24h on protocol-specific news (not broad market)
Mid-cap DeFi token (AAVE/COMP/MKR) drops ≥15% within 48h of CRV crash

exit_conditions.take_profit: Victim token rebounds 12% from oversold low
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Victim token drops additional 8% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Mid-cap DeFi tokens show ≤5% correlation to CRV crash during STRESS regimes, or fail to bounce ≥8% from oversold lows.
